Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Inene abo [bangakholwayo (baleqa)], bathande ubomi balo mhlaba beshiya ngemva kwabo iMini ebuhlungu
SiThi ababadalayo Sabomeleza izimo zabo, kanti Sithanda Singayijika imbonakalo yabo ngotshintsho (olwahluke) kwaphela
Inene le Vesi (ye‘Kur’ân) isisiyalo, ngoko ke lowo uthandayo makazithabathele iNdlela eya eNkosini yakhe
Ukanti nina aningekhe nikwazi, ngaphandle kokuba kuthande uAllâh. Inene uAllâh nguSolwazi nguSobulumko
Yena Uya kungenisa kwinceba yaKhe lowo Amthandileyo. Abenzi bobubi ke bona Ubalungiselele isohlwayo esibuhlungu
(Ndifunga) ngemimoya ethunyelwa phambili omnye emva komnye
Naxa	abaThunywa	behlanganiselwe	ixesha	labo elikhethiweyo
Yiyiphi le Mini le miqondiso irhoxiselwa yona
Yintoni na enokukwenza wazi ukuba iyintoni na iMini yohlengahlengiso
Siya kwenza njalo ke nangezizukulwana zamva ukulandelisa
